content: **about ** the rosemary scarf is a delicate accessory worked in a light and airy lace pattern framed by elegant i-cord edges for a graceful finish knitted flat and guided by a chart it s an approachable project which lets you settle into a calm steady flow the length can be adjusted to suit your personal style making it a timeless piece for any wardrobe charts for the swatch and the scarf can be found at the end of the pattern **gauge ** 24 sts x 33 row = 10 x 10 cm in pattern stitch **recommended needles ** 3 5 mm circular needles 60 cm long **yarn ** 25 g of classic by cardiff cashmere or any other yarn that meets the gauge the scarf in the pictures is knitted in classic by cardiff cashmere in col 721 ito this design is part of a growing collection of slow intentional knits you may also enjoy the rosemary vest and rosemary vest mini https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/rosemary-vest https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/rosemary-vest-mini
